mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.supplier_name AS "supplierName", a.supplier_code AS "supplierCode", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM archive_supplier a
AND a.supplier_code LIKE '%'||#{supplierCode}||'%' '%'+#{supplierCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{supplierCode}, '%')
AND a.supplier_name LIKE '%'||#{supplierName}||'%' '%'+#{supplierName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{supplierName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO archive_supplier( supplier_name, supplier_code, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{supplierName}, #{supplierCode}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE archive_supplier SET supplier_name = #{supplierName}, supplier_code = #{supplierCode}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
